## Serious Game [ensured energy]{.smallcaps} {.smaller}
Serious Games

:   *Games that do not have entertainment, enjoyment or fun as their primary purpose.* [@Michael2005SeriousGG]\citep{Michael2005SeriousGG}

In [[ensured energy]{.smallcaps}](https://sweet-sure.ch/game/) players manage the Swiss energy system until 2050:
